feed.title: ราวเหมือนดั่งความฝัน
feed.subtitle: it's like a dream...

content.div: redesigned my about page to be more soul hackers themed. i also removed the chatbox on my main page since the service i was using, chattable, is no longer active :( once i've decided on a new service it'll be replaced tho!

entry.title: more stuff added to the resources site

content.div: i added more links to my resources site. specifically i added some more online tools and references to the website building page, added goldendict to the language learning tools page, and added a browser tools and extensions section to the more links page.

finally released my website building page on my resources site to the public! i still want to add sections for graphics and accessibility in the future though. i did some behind-the-scenes updates to the code on my resources site last week to make it functional without javascript, so if something looks broken please hard refresh (ctrl+f5)

entry.title: my favorite video game locations
entry.content: added a new page for my favorite video game locations! it works better if audio autoplay is enabled but you can manually toggle audio on and off too.

entry.title: new rss feed
entry.content: created this atom/rss feed! i'll still be maintaining the changelogs on my site but i'll be updating this feed as well for those who aren't on neocities or just prefer rss managers
